summary: crypto: ccp - Use kzalloc for sev ioctl interfaces to prevent kernel memory leak
details:
crypto: ccp - Use kzalloc for sev ioctl interfaces to prevent kernel memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit e11fb0a3a39bb42da35fa662c46ce7391f277436, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 38103671aad38e888743dd26c767869cfc15adca. For more details please see the references link.
